overview: Bill brings to Clickable over 12 years experience in direct sales, partner development and account management. Before Clickable, Bill oversaw the direct sales efforts for Google’s Commerce and Analytics team responsible for forging strategic partnerships with key customers including Nike, Proctor & Gamble, 20th Century Fox, IAC and Conde Nast. Prior to Google, he was a Sales Manager at Advertising.com where he also developed, launched and published Advertising.com’s research platform. As Account Development Director at Jupiter Media Metrix (now comScore Media Metrix), Mr. Masterson was the recipient of multiple sales awards for his work with several of the company’s marquee clients. Bill began his career as an Analyst for ACNielsen servicing Kraft, Gillette and Colgate-Palmolive. He is a graduate of Providence College with a degree in Marketing.
